mapper.select: select mo_id, suppliername, billdate, orderuser, edate, amout, state, mo_number, billcode from asms.w_materialorder where mo_id = #{moId}
select mo_id, suppliername, billdate, orderuser, edate, amout, state, mo_number, billcode from asms.w_materialorder limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.w_materialorder(suppliername, billdate, orderuser, edate, amout, state, mo_number, billcode) values (#{suppliername}, #{billdate}, #{orderuser}, #{edate}, #{amout}, #{state}, #{moNumber}, #{billcode})

insert into asms.w_materialorder(suppliername, billdate, orderuser, edate, amout, state, mo_number, billcode) values
(#{entity.suppliername}, #{entity.billdate}, #{entity.orderuser}, #{entity.edate}, #{entity.amout}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.moNumber}, #{entity.billcode})

insert into asms.w_materialorder(suppliername, billdate, orderuser, edate, amout, state, mo_number, billcode) values
(#{entity.suppliername}, #{entity.billdate}, #{entity.orderuser}, #{entity.edate}, #{entity.amout}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.moNumber}, #{entity.billcode})
on duplicate key update suppliername = values(suppliername) , billdate = values(billdate) , orderuser = values(orderuser) , edate = values(edate) , amout = values(amout) , state = values(state) , mo_number = values(mo_number) , billcode = values(billcode)
mapper.update:
update asms.w_materialorder
suppliername = #{suppliername},
billdate = #{billdate},
orderuser = #{orderuser},
edate = #{edate},
amout = #{amout},
state = #{state},
mo_number = #{moNumber},
billcode = #{billcode},
where mo_id = #{moId}
